issue.title: www.sport.es

labels.name: A: Cannot reproduce
labels.description: Filters devs cannot reproduce this issue

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Anti Adblock Script) [https://www.sport.es/es/noticias/barca/dardo-directo-flick-real-madrid-121778860](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.sport.es%2Fes%2Fnoticias%2Fbarca%2Fdardo-directo-flick-real-madrid-121778860) ### Comment > Es un periódico. En la home no hay problemas, pero en cuanto se entra en una noticia te sale ese popup para que desactives el bloqueador y se te coloca al frente y se mueve con el desplazamiento. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adtidy.org/sitereports/o9kt3vp814gog8skgwwokcockgw8cc0f8jylivhoz4.jpg?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for iOS v4.5.12 License type: | paid Advanced protection: | enabled DNS filtering: | server: `AdGuard DNS`
Filters: | Ad blocking:
AdGuard Base,
AdGuard Mobile Ads

Privacy:
AdGuard Tracking Protection

Language-specific:
AdGuard Spanish/Portuguese Other extensions used: | `Nada más `

issue.title: direct.lc.chat
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://direct.lc.chat/15663096/1](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fdirect.lc.chat%2F15663096%2F1) ### Comment > The live chat window does not appear until AdGuard is disabled, rendering the website entirely useless. This is likely due to > ``https://secure.livechatinc.com/customer/action/open_chat?license_id=15663096&group=1&embedded=1&widget_version=3&unique_groups=0&organization_id=0b0e3a08-3145-44fc-81f7-70f03febe2c3&use_parent_storage=1&x-region=us-south1`` > being considered a "tracker", or simply being blocked in general. > > Whitelisting > ```@@||secure.livechatinc.com^$domain=direct.lc.chat``` > ensures the page loads properly. ``` Username: @RevontuletCXVII ``` ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/kjgpue7efr444go088cwccw0g8gcok8t65fhsifswg.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/bkwbfejmaps0oc0k4k0kwo440gkcww8ldvjkazw0xs.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Windows v7.21.3 (5089) System version: | `Microsoft Windows NT 10.0.22631.0` Browser: | Firefox License type: | paid AdGuard driver: | WFP Tracking protection: | **General settings**:
Block trackers,
Strip URLs from tracking parameters,
Hide your search queries,

Self-destructing third-party cookies (180)

**Windows tracking**:
Disable Windows Telemetry,
Turn off Advertising ID

Remove X-Client-Data header from HTTP requests DNS filtering: | server: `quic://dns.adguard-dns.com`

`AdGuard Popup Blocker (url: https://userscripts.adtidy.org/release/popup-blocker/2.5/popupblocker.user.js)` Userstyles: | disabled Referrer: | [https://kent.bike/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fkent.bike%2F) ### Issue configuration [Import](https://reports.adguard.com/settings/import.html?product_type=win&product_version=7.21.3+%285089%29&system_version=Microsoft+Windows+NT+10.0.22631.0&browser=firefox&filters=1.2.3.4.6.9.17.18.19.20.21.22.105.109&custom_filters=User%2520rules%2520%28url%253A%2520none%29&dns_servers=quic%3A%2F%2Fdns.adguard-dns.com&userscripts=AdGuard%2520Extra%2520%28url%253A%2520https%253A%252F%252Fuserscripts.adtidy.org%252Frelease%252Fadguard-extra%252F1.0%252Fadguard-extra.user.js%29%252C%250AAdGuard%2520Popup%2520Blocker%2520%28url%253A%2520https%253A%252F%252Fuserscripts.adtidy.org%252Frelease%252Fpopup-blocker%252F2.5%252Fpopupblocker.user.js%29&dns.filters=AdGuard%2520DNS%2520Filter%252C%250AUser%2520rules%2520%28url%253A%2520none%29&dns.filters_enabled=true&dns.enabled=true&browsing_security.enabled=true&browsing_security.statistics_enabled=false&stealth.enabled=true&stealth.webrtc=false&stealth.push=false&stealth.location=false&stealth.flash=false&stealth.java=false&stealth.strip_url=true&stealth.hide_search_queries=true&stealth.DNT=true&stealth.x_client=true&stealth.dpi=false&stealth.third_party_cookies=180&stealth.disable_third_party_cache=false&stealth.block_third_party_auth=false&stealth.block_trackers=true&stealth.disable_wap_push_message_routing_service=false&stealth.disable_windows_defender=false&stealth.disable_windows_telemetry=true&stealth.turn_off_advertising_id=true&referrer=https%253A%252F%252Fkent.bike%252F&win.wfp=true&license_type=paid&scheme_version=2&adblocking.enabled=true)

### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.ea.com/games/madden-nfl/madden-nfl-mobile](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ea.com%2Fgames%2Fmadden-nfl%2Fmadden-nfl-mobile) ### Comment > Madden mobile app loads but can’t play any activities. issue.title: www.ea.com

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.ea.com/games/madden-nfl/madden-nfl-mobile](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ea.com%2Fgames%2Fmadden-nfl%2Fmadden-nfl-mobile) ### Comment > Madden mobile app loads but can’t play any activities. Always freezes at 99% loaded. Turning off AdGuard solves the problem ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adtidy.org/sitereports/8r94a8r6jx0c00w44sssc8g80k88cok7dz3ji04d9o.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adtidy.org/sitereports/22906rp7wuisc8oc00k0ksk00ccgk4o3btf8zt09ko.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for iOS v4.5.12 License type: | paid Advanced protection: | enabled DNS filtering: | server: `https://d.adguard-dns.com/dns-query/xxxxxxx`
filters: `https://filters.adtidy.org/dns/filter_1_ios.txt` Filters: | Ad blocking:
AdGuard Base,
AdGuard Mobile Ads

Privacy:
AdGuard Tracking Protection

Social widgets:
AdGuard Social Media

Annoyances:
AdGuard Cookie Notices,
AdGuard Popups,
AdGuard Mobile App Banners,
AdGuard Other Annoyances,
AdGuard Widgets Other extensions used: | `None`
